text: The Captains Regent are the heads of state of San Marino and leaders of the government. There are always two Captains Regent and they serve terms of six months. ==List (since 1900)== Since 1900 Year Semester Captain Regent One Captain Regent Two 1900 April Domenico Fattori Antonio Righi
